channel.title: diversity on Varsha's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in diversity on Varsha's Blog

item.title: Diversity Essay
item.description: Essay Diversity resonates with me on many levels; I have had the privilege of growing up in a multicultural environment. As a native of India, my country is well-known for its diversity in languages, cultures and traditions. I have spent most of my childhood in Japan around people from various walks of life. I feel lucky to have a friend living in a different country and sharing their experiences with people.
